title: New & MPfree: Boy Party – July
content:
It’s not often that you get two songs of the same name that are equally incredible, even less likely is the probability of them being released in the same year.

After July by Youth Lagoon took the internet by storm earlier in the year, a track of the same title by Boy Party looks set to do the same. Gloriously lo-fi vocals and surf-pop guitars orchestrate the majority of July, whilst spoken word sections litter the track. It’s these short dialogues that provide a titillating contrast to the sections that are sung; and thus aid July on it’s way to be a track where further intricacies and inspired beauty formulate on repeated listens. July is taken from Who Cares? the first full length from Boy Party, out early September. Stream and download July below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
